metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10872 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Poppler 0.74.0. There is a heap-based buffer over-read in the function Splash::blitTransparent at splash/Splash.cc.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10872` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler-cpp0 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
libpoppler58 - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
poppler-utils - 0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.41.0-0ubuntu1.14').
